Title: MVC Themes
Description:
This project makes it easy implementing themes for your ASP.NET MVC web application.

Using the DependencyResolver, the basic theme engine can be made to work exactly as you need it to.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This project makes it easy implementing themes for your ASP.NET MVC web application.

Using the DependencyResolver, the basic theme engine can be made to work exactly as you need it to.

Demo site

http://mvcthemes.creativeminds.dk

Documentation

Take a look http://mvcthemes.codeplex.com/documentation
